info.title: Pulsarr API
info.description: API documentation for Pulsarr - a Plex watchlist integration for Sonarr and Radarr

post.description: Create a new approval request for content routing

get.description: Retrieve approval requests with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific approval request by its ID

patch.description: Update an approval request (approve, reject, or modify)

delete.description: Permanently delete an approval request from database

post.description: Reject an approval request (marks as rejected)

get.description: Get statistics about approval requests

post.description: Approve an approval request and execute the proposed routing
Approve multiple approval requests in batch
Reject multiple approval requests in batch

delete.description: Delete multiple approval requests in batch

get.description: Retrieve the current application configuration settings
Retrieve all content router rules configured in the system

post.description: Create a new content router rule with specified conditions and targets

get.description: Retrieve content router rules filtered by specific type
Retrieve content router rules for a specific target instance
Retrieve a specific content router rule by its ID

put.description: Update an existing content router rule by its ID

delete.description: Delete a content router rule by its ID

get.summary: Get router rules by target type
get.description: Retrieve content router rules filtered by target application type

patch.description: Enable or disable a content router rule by its ID

get.description: Retrieve information about available content router evaluator plugins
Retrieve detailed metadata about content router evaluator plugins including supported fields and operators

post.description: Start the Discord notification bot service
Stop the Discord notification bot service
Validate one or more Discord webhook URLs for proper functionality
Process webhooks from Radarr (movies) or Sonarr (TV series) for media notifications

get.description: Retrieve the current user watchlist items from Plex
Retrieve watchlist items from other Plex users
Verifies connectivity to the configured Plex server
Generate RSS feed URLs for Plex watchlists
Parse and process RSS feed watchlist items
Retrieve all genres from watchlist items

post.description: Configure Plex webhook notifications for Radarr and Sonarr instances

delete.description: Remove Plex webhook notifications from Radarr and Sonarr instances

get.description: Check if Plex notifications are configured for Radarr and Sonarr instances

post.description: Discover available Plex servers using a user token

get.description: Server-Sent Events stream for real-time progress updates. This endpoint establishes an SSE connection to receive progress updates for various operations like watchlist syncing, delete sync analysis, etc.

post.description: Create a quota configuration for a user

get.description: Get all users that have quota configurations
Get quota configurations for a specific user

patch.description: Update quota configurations for a specific user

delete.description: Delete quota configuration for a specific user

patch.summary: Update separate movie and show quotas
patch.description: Update movie and show quota configurations separately for a user

get.description: Get current quota status for a user

post.summary: Get quota status for multiple users
post.description: Get current quota status for multiple users in a single request
Record quota usage for a user

get.description: Get quota usage history for a user
Get daily usage statistics for a user

patch.description: Perform bulk quota operations on multiple users (update or delete)

delete.description: Clean up old quota usage records

post.description: Create a new tag in a Radarr instance

get.description: Retrieve quality profiles from a Radarr instance
Retrieve all configured Radarr instances

post.description: Create a new Radarr instance configuration

put.description: Update an existing Radarr instance configuration

get.description: Retrieve root folders from a Radarr instance
Retrieve tags from a Radarr instance

post.description: Test connectivity to a Radarr instance with provided credentials

get.description: Retrieve all configured job schedules and their status

post.description: Create a new job schedule or update an existing one

get.description: Retrieve a specific job schedule by its name

put.description: Update an existing job schedule configuration

delete.description: Delete a job schedule by its name

post.description: Execute a scheduled job immediately

patch.description: Enable or disable a job schedule

post.description: Perform a dry-run of the delete sync job to preview what would be deleted

get.description: Retrieve all shows currently being monitored by the rolling monitoring system

post.description: Manually trigger the Plex session monitoring process to check for viewing activity and update rolling monitored shows

delete.description: Remove a show from rolling monitoring and stop tracking its viewing activity

post.description: Reset a rolling monitored show back to its original monitoring state (pilot only or first season only)

get.description: Retrieve rolling monitored shows that have been inactive for a specified number of days

post.description: Reset all rolling monitored shows that have been inactive for a specified number of days
Create a new tag in a Sonarr instance

get.description: Retrieve quality profiles from a Sonarr instance
Retrieve root folders from a Sonarr instance
Retrieve all configured Sonarr instances

post.description: Create a new Sonarr instance configuration

put.description: Update an existing Sonarr instance configuration

get.description: Retrieve tags from a Sonarr instance

post.description: Test connectivity to a Sonarr instance with provided credentials

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive dashboard statistics including genres, content, users, and activity
Retrieve content distribution across different instances
Retrieve the most popular genres from watchlists
Retrieve the most watchlisted TV shows
Retrieve the most watchlisted movies
Retrieve users with the most watchlist items
Retrieve recent activity statistics for a specified time period
Retrieve average time from adding to availability statistics

get.summary: Get grabbed to notified time stats
get.description: Retrieve average time from grabbed to notified statistics
Retrieve detailed status transition time metrics
Retrieve status flow data for visualization
Retrieve notification statistics for a specified time period

post.description: Synchronize watchlist items to a specific Radarr or Sonarr instance
Synchronize watchlist items to all configured Radarr and Sonarr instances

get.description: Retrieve the current user tagging configuration status

put.description: Update the user tagging configuration settings

post.description: Create user tags in Sonarr and Radarr instances
Synchronize content with user tags in Sonarr and Radarr instances
Clean up orphaned user tags from instances
Remove all user tags from media and optionally delete tag definitions
Sync Pulsarr users with Tautulli notification agents. Requires Plex Pass.

post.summary: Test Tautulli connection with provided credentials
post.description: Test the connection to Tautulli using provided URL and API key. Requires Plex Pass.
Test the connection to Tautulli using the current configuration. Requires Plex Pass.

patch.description: Update multiple users with the same changes in bulk

put.description: Change the current user password by providing current and new password

post.description: Create the first admin user account for the system
Authenticate user by email and password
End the current user session and destroy authentication

get.description: Retrieve information about the currently authenticated user, including Plex avatar if available

Retrieve a list of all users including their watchlist item counts

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

patch.description: Update an existing user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a specific user by their ID
Fetch all watchlist items for a specific user by their ID

Stop the currently running watchlist processing workflow

get.description: Retrieve the current status of the watchlist processing workflow
